alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Morgan County through 545 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Falkville, or 9 miles east of Hartselle, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hartselle, Priceville, Falkville, Somerville, Eva, Florette and Cole Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
